lead_paragraph: The New England Patriots said that Nick Kaczur, an offensive lineman charged with drug possession, would remain on the team. But the Patriots had no comment on disciplinary action it might take. Kaczur was arrested April 27 after the police said a small amount of OxyContin was found in his truck after a traffic stop. Kaczur helped the federal authorities catch the man he said was supplying him with the drug, 35-year-old Daniel Ekasala, who is free on bail after pleading not guilty.
